title: Rose Gold Mangalsutra - A Modern Take on Tradition
features: Delicate rose gold chain adorned with alternating black beads and sparkling cubic zirconia flower pendants. Minimalist design perfect for everyday wear. Classic black bead arrangement with modern floral accents.
description: This elegant mangalsutra offers a modern twist on a traditional symbol of marriage. The delicate rose gold chain and sparkling cubic zirconia pendants add a touch of sophistication, while the black beads retain the cultural significance. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear, this piece seamlessly blends tradition with contemporary style.
